game.name: Wraith of the Cards
game.shortDescription: Wraith of the Cards is a turn-based deckbuilding RPG with platforming exploration! Explore the vast halls of a mysterious mansion that has called you forth, and attack your way through enemies using special card magic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wraith of the Cards is a turn-based deckbuilding RPG with platforming exploration! Explore the vast halls of a mysterious mansion that has called you forth, and attack your way through enemies using special card magic!
